dialogue.name: Trump
dialogue.text: You're really pissing me off. I mean, it's ridiculous.

dialogue.name: Elon
dialogue.text: I just have a few questions I'd like to ask you. It's about one of my employees.

dialogue.name: Trump
dialogue.text: Oh yes, it's so very sad that Dr. Bob died yesterday. Truly, I tell you. Believe me.

dialogue.name: Elon
dialogue.text: Wait... how did you know that?

dialogue.name: Trump
dialogue.text: I'm kidding, I'm kidding. Believe me.

dialogue.name: Elon
dialogue.text: (Hmm... interesting...) Well, I guess I'll see you later, Don.
